feels.name: Joy
feels.quote: O my Monimia! how will the pleasure of this hour be propagated! As yet thou knowest not all the bliss that is reserved for thy enjoyment!

feels.name: Surprise
feels.quote: At length his agony was overcome. He recollected all his resolution, and, in a strain of awestruck rapture, thus addressed the heavenly visitant: 'Hast thou then heard, pure spirit! the wailings of my grief?'

feels.name: Love
feels.quote: He poured forth the dictates of his gratitude to the preservers of his happiness.

causedByEvent.name: Feeling grateful for the reunion with Monimia

feels.name: Relief
feels.quote: In order to dissipate these interesting ideas, which, by being too long indulged, might have endangered his reason, Madam Clement entreated him to entertain the company with a detail of what had happened to him in his last journey to the empire.

causedByEvent.name: Madam Clement's request to share his journey details

feels.name: Joy
feels.quote: O my dear lady! forgive the wild transports of a fond lover, who hath so unexpectedly retrieved the jewel of his soul!

feels.name: Relief
feels.quote: Monimia taking Madam Clement by the hand, 'Whatever joy,' said she, 'Renaldo derives from this occasion, is owing to the bounty, the compassion, and maternal care of this incomparable lady.'

causedByEvent.name: Feeling grateful for Madam Clement's care
